feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 5:31PM AKST until January 01 at 8:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM AKST MONDAY FOR THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta Coast.

entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 5:26PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds and Significant Blowing Snow Monday Night Through Thursday Morning... East winds 25 to 35 mph gusting as high as 55 mph are expected to develop Monday and persist through Thursday Morning, peaking Tuesday and Wednesday. This will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow creating dangerous travel conditions due to low

entry.summary: ...SLICK TRAVEL CONDITIONS TONIGHT...
